publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7519.2.1 Gavin Brown: The Scottish Economy—As an amendment to amendment (S3M-7519.2) in the name of Jim Mather, insert at end "; calls on the Scottish Government to pay particular focus to improving Scotland’s record on exporting and internationalisation of businesses, and also calls on the Scottish Government to focus on improving the business start-up rate."
